summary: REQ-22 and REQ-24 appear implemented in code (hero now uses the exact tiger decal paths with a wrapper that hides broken images; SoundtrackControls now plays audio from the required static URL and shows a user-facing error on failure). However, the diff summary does not show the required static asset files being added under frontend/public, so REQ-23 and REQ-25 cannot be verified as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add/verify the required static tiger decal image assets exist in the frontend public assets path under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the exact filenames referenced by the app.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows App.tsx referencing the tiger decal images, but there is no evidence in the diff summary of the corresponding PNG files being added to `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the soundtrack audio asset exists in the frontend public assets path at the exact URL `/assets/audio/barrera-healthy-eats-theme.mp3`.
missing_requirements.reason: SoundtrackControls.tsx loads `/assets/audio/barrera-healthy-eats-theme.mp3`, but the diff summary does not show the MP3 being added under `frontend/public/assets/audio/`, so runtime serving/404 avoidance cannot be confirmed.
